attributes.action: Investigate Nigel Farage for breach of conduct against the NOLAN Principles.
attributes.additional_details:
NOLAN Principles for Conduct in Public Life: 
We feel there are question marks against all 7 principles: 

https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/the-7-principles-of-public-life

But particularly: 

3.Objectivity
Holders of public office must act and take decisions impartially, fairly and on merit, using the best evidence and without discrimination or bias.

6.Honesty
Holders of public office should be truthful.
attributes.background: In particular the evident lies used to mislead the population in the recent EU referendum which he  himself refuted within hours of the result. This demonstrated unacceptable  disregard for the democratic process and people of the UK,  potentially skewing the result.

rejection.details: Nigel Farage is not a Member of Parliament or a member of the Government.
